name: Passthrough Multiplayer MRTK Quest Sample
summary: Have fun together in this mixed reality hand tracking demo! This is a sample implementation of mixed reality passthrough multiplayer handracking in the Quest 2 utilizing Unity, Mixed Reality Toolkit, OVR Integration (Oculus), and Normcore for network functionallity as well as Eric Provencher's "Networked Manipulator" script to allow hand tracking data transmission over a network.
